author: agilliland
msg: making "invalidate()" methods synchronized because they loop through keys and that can cause ConcurrentModificationExceptions.  this should probably be revisiting to see if we can find a better way to do this.

author: nicko
msg: Updated doc comments to work with our target platforms. Fixed some ambiguous doc references.
Only use AssemblyKeyFile attribute on platforms that don't support the /keyfile compiler switch.
Updated to use new version of XmlConvert.ToString(DateTime) on .NET 2.0 platforms
I can't find a way to cref the index operator (i.e. []) correctly on all platforms, so rewrote text not to have to link directly to the operator.

author: jeremias
msg: Bugfix: addAnchor didn't find the anchor for empty inline elements in a footnote after the latest bugfix. Fixes footnote_footnote-separator.
